---
title: "Two clusters of excellence join the OSC as funding institutional members"
date: 2024-05-10
subtitle: "The OSC is looking forward to collaborate more closely with their members!"
---

NA

<p>We're happy to announce that the Excellence Cluster ORIGINS, represented by the OSC member <a href="https://www.osc.uni-muenchen.de/members/individual_members/lmu-members/kuhr/index.html">Prof. Dr. Thomas Kuhr</a> and the Cluster of Excellence SyNergy represented by OSC member <a href="https://www.osc.uni-muenchen.de/members/individual_members/lmu-members/dichgans/index.html">Prof. Dr. Martin Dichgans</a>, have joined the OSC as financially contributing institutional members. </p>
<p>To learn more about the benefits of becoming a funding institutional member, please visit <a href="https://www.osc.uni-muenchen.de/members/institutional-members/funding_inst_memb/index.html">https://www.osc.uni-muenchen.de/members/institutional-members/funding_inst_memb/index.html</a>. </p>
